name: Idea Grove
tag_list: pr, public-relations, dallas-pr, dallas-public-relations, dallas-web-design, web-design
overview:
Founded in 2005, the Idea Grove is a full-service marketing and public relations agency based in Dallas, with a focus on technology and online businesses.

The Idea Grove’s founding principle is that the walls between public relations agencies, branding firms and web design firms are coming down â€” particularly for companies that are serious about their online presence. Today, online public relations, social media, SEO and Web design are overlapping disciplines; this means that the best choice is a single provider.

The Idea Grove works with clients ranging from venture-backed startups to Fortune 500 corporations, with clients in Silicon Valley, New York and Dallas. The agency focuses on clients in the B2B, technology, online and healthcare sectors.
